title: How to Order Items off the Internet Without Your Parents' Permission

steps.title: Calculate the price of the item you want.
steps.content: Calculate the price of the item you want. Go to the website you wish to order off of and add the item to your wish list and check the shipping. Add the shipping and the actual cost of the item. The sum is how much money you'll need to buy the item.

steps.title: Go to your local supermarket and buy a gift card to the online store.
steps.content: Go to your local supermarket and buy a gift card to the online store. Most stores will have a website and the website should accept gift cards as payment. Buy enough gift cards to get your item. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Go on the computer when your parents aren't around to see what website you are going on.
steps.content: Go on the computer when your parents aren't around to see what website you are going on. Order the item and look for an appropriate shipping speed. Try to have the item arrive when you know your parents are not home or when you can check the mail.

steps.title: Receive the item in the mail (or be there when the post services ring the doorbell).
steps.content: Receive the item in the mail (or be there when the post services ring the doorbell). Check the mail before your parents do. Do not go overboard in worrying about the mail.

steps.title: Hide the item.
steps.content: Hide the item. Look for a place to hide it in your room or the basement. Make sure your parents won't find it ever because then you will be caught. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Destroy the evidence.
steps.content: Destroy the evidence. Throw away all receipts, boxes, envelopes, etc. This can also get you in trouble.
